verbs.description: [V: recognize] [ARG1: him] police seek suspect accused of stealing formula from target 3 times police believe the same suspect is responsible for three retail theft incidents at target on shady lane in menomonee falls in 10 days the thefts happened on oct 17 oct 19 and oct 27
